verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר <WH559> le-Mor saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲדַ֧ת <WH5712> 'a-Dat unto all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֥ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-le-Hem to קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> ke-do-Shim unto them Ye shall be holy תִּהְי֑וּ <WH1961> tih-Yu; become כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for קָד֔וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh, [am] holy אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh for I the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every man אִמּ֤וֹ <WH517> im-Mo his mother וְאָבִיו֙ <WH1> ve-'a-Viv and his father תִּירָ֔אוּ <WH3372> ti-Ra-'u, Ye shall fear וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <WH7676> shab-be-to-Tai my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <WH8104> tish-Mo-ru; and keep אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּפְנוּ֙ <WH6437> tif-Nu Turn אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלִילִ֔ים <WH457> ha-'e-li-Lim, ye not unto idols וֵֽאלֹהֵי֙ <WH430> ve-lo-Hei gods מַסֵּכָ֔ה <WH4541> mas-se-Chah, to yourselves molten לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo or תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su nor make לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וְכִ֧י <WH3588> ve-Chi now when תִזְבְּח֛וּ <WH2076> tiz-be-Chu And if ye offer זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> Ze-vach a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> she-la-Mim of peace offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֖ם <WH7522> lir-tzo-ne-Chem it at your own will תִּזְבָּחֻֽהוּ׃ <WH2076> tiz-ba-Chu-hu. ye shall offer

בְּי֧וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom the same day זִבְחֲכֶ֛ם <WH2077> ziv-cha-Chem ye offer יֵאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel It shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֑ת <WH4283> u-mi-mo-cho-Rat; it and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <WH3498> ve-han-no-Tar and if ought remain עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi, until the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh in the fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <WH8313> yis-sa-Ref. it shall be burnt

וְאִ֛ם <WH518> ve-'Im if הֵאָכֹ֥ל <WH3605> he-'a-Chol it יֵאָכֵ֖ל <WH398> ye-'a-Chel And if it be eaten בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi; on the third פִּגּ֥וּל <WH6292> pig-Gul it [is] abominable ה֖וּא <WH1931> hu he לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יֵרָצֶֽה׃ <WH7521> ye-ra-Tzeh. it shall not be accepted

וְאֹֽכְלָיו֙ <WH398> ve-'o-che-Lav Therefore [every one] that eateth עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <WH5771> a-vo-No his iniquity יִשָּׂ֔א <WH5375> yis-Sa, it shall bear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh the hallowed thing יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD חִלֵּ֑ל <WH2490> chil-Lel; because he hath profaned וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> han-Ne-fesh and that soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> ha-Hiv he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <WH5971> me-'am-Mei-ha. from among his people

וּֽבְקֻצְרְכֶם֙ <WH7114> u-ve-kutz-re-Chem And when ye reap אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קְצִ֣יר <WH7105> ke-Tzir the harvest אַרְצְכֶ֔ם <WH776> 'ar-tze-Chem, of your land לֹ֧א <WH3808> lo nor תְכַלֶּ֛ה <WH3615> te-chal-Leh thou shalt not wholly reap פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> pe-'At the corners שָׂדְךָ֖ <WH7704> sa-de-Cha of thy field לִקְצֹ֑ר <WH7614> lik-Tzor; Sheba וְלֶ֥קֶט <WH3951> ve-Le-ket the gleanings קְצִֽירְךָ֖ <WH7105> ke-tzi-re-Cha of thy harvest לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor תְלַקֵּֽט׃ <WH3950> te-lak-Ket. neither shalt thou gather

וְכַרְמְךָ֙ <WH3754> ve-char-me-Cha thy vineyard לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor תְעוֹלֵ֔ל <WH5953> te-'o-Lel, And thou shalt not glean וּפֶ֥רֶט <WH6528> u-Fe-ret [every] grape כַּרְמְךָ֖ <WH3754> kar-me-Cha of thy vineyard לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor תְלַקֵּ֑ט <WH3950> te-lak-Ket; neither shalt thou gather לֶֽעָנִ֤י <WH6041> le-'a-Ni them for the poor וְלַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> ve-lag-Ger and stranger תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> ta-'a-Zo thou shalt leave אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo nor תִּגְנֹ֑בוּ <WH1589> tig-Nou; Ye shall not steal וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor תְכַחֲשׁ֥וּ <WH3584> te-cha-cha-Shu neither deal falsely וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor תְשַׁקְּר֖וּ <WH8266> te-shak-ke-Ru neither lie אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish one בַּעֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH5997> ba-'a-mi-To. to another

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- shall not תִשָּׁבְע֥וּ <WH7650> tish-sha-ve-'U And ye shall not swear בִשְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> vish-Mi by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> lash-Sha-ker; falsely וְחִלַּלְתָּ֛ <WH2490> ve-chil-lal-Ta neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> shem the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha of thy God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <WH6231> ta-'a-Shok Thou shalt not defraud אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֵֽעֲךָ֖ <WH7453> re-'a-Cha thy neighbour וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor תִגְזֹ֑ל <WH1497> tig-Zol; neither rob לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תָלִ֞ין <WH3885> ta-Lin shall not abide פְּעֻלַּ֥ת <WH6468> pe-'ul-Lat [him] the wages שָׂכִ֛יר <WH7916> sa-Chir of him that is hired אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> 'it-te-Cha for עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> Bo-ker. with thee all night until the morning

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תְקַלֵּ֣ל <WH7043> te-kal-Lel Thou shalt not curse חֵרֵ֔שׁ <WH2795> che-Resh, the deaf וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> ve-lif-Nei before עִוֵּ֔ר <WH5787> 'iv-Ver, the blind לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> tit-Ten nor put מִכְשֹׁ֑ל <WH4383> mich-Shol; a stumblingblock וְיָרֵ֥אתָ <WH3372> ve-ya-Re-ta but shalt fear מֵּאֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> me-'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no תַעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su Ye shall do עָ֙וֶל֙ <WH5766> 'a-vel no unrighteousness בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> bam-mish-Pat, in judgment לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> tis-Sa thou shalt not respect פְנֵי־ <WH6440> fe-nei- the person דָ֔ל <WH1800> Dal, of the poor וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor תֶהְדַּ֖ר <WH1921> teh-Dar nor honour פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei the person גָד֑וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol; of the mighty בְּצֶ֖דֶק <WH6664> be-Tze-dek [but] in righteousness תִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> tish-Pot shalt thou judge עֲמִיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH5997> 'a-mi-Te-cha. thy neighbour

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תֵלֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> te-Lech go רָכִיל֙ <WH7400> ra-Chil up and down [as] a talebearer בְּעַמֶּ֔יךָ <WH5971> be-'am-Mei-cha, among thy people לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not תַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> ta-'a-Mod neither shalt thou stand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against דַּ֣ם <WH1818> dam against the blood רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> re-'E-cha; of thy neighbour אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִשְׂנָ֥א <WH8130> tis-Na Thou shalt not hate אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> bil-va-Ve-cha; in thine heart הוֹכֵ֤חַ <WH3198> ho-Che-ach thou shalt in any wise תּוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <WH3198> to-Chi-ach rebuke אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <WH5997> 'a-mi-Te-cha, thy neighbour וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- shall not תִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> tis-Sa and not suffer עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav because חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> Chet. sin

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִקֹּ֤ם <WH5358> tik-Kom Thou shalt not avenge וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor תִטֹּר֙ <WH5201> tit-Tor nor bear any grudge אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei against the children עַמֶּ֔ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha, of thy people וְאָֽהַבְתָּ֥ <WH157> ve-'a-hav-Ta but thou shalt love לְרֵעֲךָ֖ <WH7453> le-re-'a-Cha thy neighbour כָּמ֑וֹךָ <WH3644> ka-Mo-cha; as thyself אֲנִ֖י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- חֻקֹּתַי֮ <WH2708> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes תִּשְׁמֹרוּ֒ <WH8104> tish-mo-Ru Ye shall keep בְּהֶמְתְּךָ֙ <WH929> be-hem-te-Cha Thou shalt not let thy cattle לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תַרְבִּ֣יעַ <WH7250> tar-Bi-a' gender כִּלְאַ֔יִם <WH3610> kil-'A-yim, with a diverse kind שָׂדְךָ֖ <WH7704> sa-de-Cha thy field לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- nor תִזְרַ֣ע <WH2232> tiz-Ra' thou shalt not sow כִּלְאָ֑יִם <WH3610> kil-'A-yim; with mingled seed וּבֶ֤גֶד <WH899> u-Ve-ged neither shall a garment כִּלְאַ֙יִם֙ <WH3610> kil-'A-yim mingled שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <WH8162> sha-'at-Nez, of linen and woollen לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor יַעֲלֶ֖ה <WH5927> ya-'a-Leh come עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha. and פ Peh

וְ֠אִישׁ <WH376> Ve-'ish And whosoever כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- now if יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <WH7901> yish-Kav lieth אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אִשָּׁ֜ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah with a woman שִׁכְבַת־ <WH7902> shich-vat- seed זֶ֗רַע <WH2233> Ze-ra', child וְהִ֤וא <WH1931> ve-Hiv who שִׁפְחָה֙ <WH8198> shif-Chah that [is] a bondmaid נֶחֱרֶ֣פֶת <WH2778> ne-che-Re-fet betrothed לְאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish, to an husband וְהָפְדֵּה֙ <WH6299> ve-ha-fe-Deh and not at all לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no נִפְדָּ֔תָה <WH6299> nif-Da-tah, redeemed א֥וֹ <WH176> o and חֻפְשָׁ֖ה <WH2668> chuf-Shah nor freedom לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo nor נִתַּן־ <WH5414> nit-tan- given לָ֑הּ Lah; בִּקֹּ֧רֶת <WH1244> bik-Ko-ret her she shall be scourged תִּהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor יוּמְת֖וּ <WH4191> yu-me-Tu they shall not be put to death כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- because לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor חֻפָּֽשָׁה׃ <WH2666> chup-Pa-shah. because she was not free

וְהֵבִ֤יא <WH935> ve-he-Vi And he shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲשָׁמוֹ֙ <WH817> a-sha-Mo his trespass offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed; of the congregation אֵ֖יל <WH352> 'eil [even] a ram אָשָֽׁם׃ <WH817> 'a-Sham. for a trespass offering

וְכִפֶּר֩ <WH3722> ve-chip-Per shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen And the priest בְּאֵ֤יל <WH352> be-'Eil for him with the ram הָֽאָשָׁם֙ <WH817> ha-'a-Sham of the trespass offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for חַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> chat-ta-To for his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָטָ֑א <WH2398> cha-Ta; which he hath done וְנִסְלַ֣ח <WH5545> ve-nis-Lach shall be forgiven ל֔וֹ lo, מֵחַטָּאת֖וֹ <WH2403> me-chat-ta-To and the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which חָטָֽא׃ <WH2398> cha-Ta. which he hath done פ Peh

וְכִי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- When תָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> ta-Vo-'u And when ye shall come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, into the land וּנְטַעְתֶּם֙ <WH5193> u-ne-ta'-Tem and shall have planted כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz all manner of trees מַאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> ma-'a-Chal, for food וַעֲרַלְתֶּ֥ם <WH6188> va-'a-ral-Tem shall count עָרְלָת֖וֹ <WH6190> a-re-la-To forbidden אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פִּרְי֑וֹ <WH6529> pir-Yo; the fruit שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> sha-Losh three שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> sha-Nim, years יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem עֲרֵלִ֖ים <WH6189> 'a-re-Lim shall it be as uncircumcised לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <WH398> ye-'a-Chel. unto you it shall not be eaten

וּבַשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> u-vash-sha-Nah year הָרְבִיעִ֔ת <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'It, But in the fourth יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פִּרְי֑וֹ <WH6529> pir-Yo; all the fruit קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh thereof shall be holy הִלּוּלִ֖ים <WH1974> hil-lu-Lim to praise לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD
